about_the_game:
The original soundtrack from Odyssey: The Deep Space Expedition.

Tracklist:

  • 01 - Aki Silventoinen - Space VR 02:22
  • 02 - Odyssey - Introduction 00:35
  • 03 - Odyssey - Mystic Audio 01:03
  • 04 - Odyssey - Calm Ambient 00:36
  • 05 - Odyssey - Enjoy Your Stay 00:06
  • 06 - Odyssey - Find The Tool 00:10
  • 07 - Odyssey - Fires 00:05
  • 08 - Odyssey - Gravitation 00:23
  • 09 - Odyssey - Asteroid Approaching 00:04
  • 10 - Odyssey - Life Incubators 00:26
  • 11 - Odyssey - Brace For Impact 00:04
  • 12 - Odyssey - Quite An Experience 00:02
  • 13 - Odyssey - Repair Damage 00:13
  • 14 - Odyssey - Oxygen Masks 00:13
  • 15 - Odyssey - This Ship Is Home 00:03
  • 16 - Odyssey - VR Introduction 00:26
  • 17 - Odyssey - Proceed To The Gate 00:08



The Soundtrack will be added to your Odyssey folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\steamapps\common\Odyssey\Soundtrack
